summary:
This is a Program that generates Readme files for your mods. This readme Generator comes with a text readme generator and a html generator (for the html generator you must know HTML to use the HTML Readme Generator) but you dont need to use the html generator portion you can just use the text readme tab

This is a very user friendly pro
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][url=http://darkwolfmodding.wix.com/darkwolfmodding]Check out my website[/url]
Contact Me:
[Twitter] (I will post my status on mod updates and upcoming mods here so follow me on twitter)
[url=https://twitter.com/DarkWolfModding]DarkWolfModding[/url]
[/size]
[size=5]Extract the File in the rar archive and run it then choose your install location and it will make a shortcut on your desktop to the program.
Endorse if you think it works well.
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/34109-1-1364621980.png[/img]

Compatable Games with this generator:
Skyrim
Oblivion
Fallout 3
Fallout New Vegas


Program Features:
Live HTML Editor (Changes as you code automatically)
Readme Generator text version
Easy UI
Fast to use

===========================================================================
Time to design and code
Coding:::::::: 1 hour
UI Design::::::::::::: 45 min to 1 hour
Total:::::::::::::::::::: About 2 hours
[/size]
author: DarkWolfModding
